Text: Is this dubbed or subtitled? Is this the Uncut version or the standard American release? At least - please tell us the running time... it would be nice to know... Please, a bit more info next time. thanks.
FYI - if the flick is from the box with the coverart you've got up there - then this version is the Studio: Starz / Anchor Bay release & runs 88 minutes
It's dubbed, and I honestly just Googled the image of the cover. AFAIK, they might be completely unrelated.
Thanks InternetNinjacy! Do you have DEMONS 3? It would be great if you could put it up here!
